attributes.action: Wire netting, spikes and glue traps to be removed from all govenment and council buildings
attributes.additional_details:
This is an e-petition for the removal of all wire netting, spikes and glue traps from all govenment and council buildings.

Not only do they look ugly but they cause serious harm to pigeons and over birds. The reseason why pigeons in towns and citys look so awful is because of the way we treat them.

Please sign this e-petition and help make our country a little less cruel to pigeons
